summary: TypeScript SDK exported API documentation is missing type aliases, module-level functions, constants, and variables from the left navigation sidebar. These items can be reached through cross-references but aren't discoverable directly in the sidebar.
userImpact: Users cannot discover and navigate to type aliases, functions, constants, and variables directly in the API documentation sidebar, limiting usability of the reference docs.
rootCause: Sidebar generation iterates only on exported markdown files without inspecting their content to include type definitions and other exported symbols.
keyQuote: structures that are defined with the `type` keyword appears nowhere in the left nav bar
